extendedInfo.description: Want to save your clean new shirt from falling mud or clay; then try this cool game âDirty Shirty Laundryâ which introduces you to the world of cleaning in a fun way and that too for FREE!!Game includes the hanging shirts and falling mud which are thrown from the door and window of the beautiful buildings. Player has to protect the shirts by sliding shirts on the rope form left to right or vice-versa from the falling puddle. Game is touch-controlled, you can move the shirts on the rope by just swiping your finger across the screen. Cool graphics and gives Cartoon Look with the eye pleasing city view of sunny day as a background having building houses, park, road dividers etc with perfect blend of colors like green, yellow, purple, red, blue, shades of white and black etc makes it more fancy and real.Sounds easy? Give a try now! The goal seems very easy but it will challenge you a lot!A time killer game and perfect for whenever you are feeling bored in buses, trains or long journeys. Game designed for cleaning maniacs out there especially for girls. Protect your shirt from getting dirty and save your time of washing it in washing machine. A lot of challenging levels have been designed. Each of the levels requires skill, concentration and patience. Four new challenging levels are to be cracked to win this free Android puzzle game. Get ready to train your brain and give a good exercise to your overloaded or exhausted mind in a fresh entertaining way.Features: 1. A simple and classic yet addicting user interface.2. 4 difficult levels ranging from beginners to experts with 3 lives.3. Engaging HD graphics and great voice-overs. 4. Develop concentration and focus5. Hours to enjoy for FREE!!If youâre a cleaning freak and love to play washing games or girls clothing games then you must try this out!! Just touch, drag and protect your favorite colored shirt from getting dirty.The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Samsung galaxy Note , Sony Xperia, HTC One V. The application works perfect on all mobiles and gives you a thrilling experience on tablets. No internet connectivity is required to play this game.Share your awesome experience with your friends and family on Facebook, twitter, gmail, googleplus, and Pinterest etc. If you love car washing and ink washing games there's a good chance you'll like this too. This game is just another attack on your free time ;-)The controls are very simple and user friendly! Tags: clothes games, laundry games, keep yourself clean.
